headline: Why Rapid7 (RPD) Is Down 23.3% After Cautious Guidance and CFO Appointment Despite Strong Q3
summary: Rapid7 recently reported its third quarter 2025 earnings, highlighting revenue of US$217.96 million and new AI-driven product capabilities, while also announcing Rafe Brown as the incoming Chief Financial Officer effective in December. Despite exceeding revenue expectations and unveiling innovations, including an expanded Microsoft partnership, analyst sentiment has turned more cautious due to softer future guidance and increased pressure from industry competition. With Rapid7's leadership...

headline: IREN (NasdaqGS:IREN) Valuation in Focus Following $9.7 Billion Microsoft AI Cloud Deal

headline: Today's AI boom is 'very different' from the 90s dot-com bubble
summary: BMO Private Wealth chief market strategist, Carol Schleif, joins Morning Brief with Yahoo Finance Senior Reporter Allie Canal to discuss whether markets (^DJI, ^GSPC, ^IXIC) are seeing an artificial intelligence (AI) bubble and to share her thoughts on Big Tech companies funding their AI projects with debt. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief.

content.title: Today's AI boom is 'very different' from the 90s dot-com bubble

BMO Private Wealth chief market strategist, Carol Schleif, joins Morning Brief with Yahoo Finance Senior Reporter Allie Canal to discuss whether markets (^DJI, ^GSPC, ^IXIC) are seeing an artificial intelligence (AI) bubble and to share her thoughts on Big Tech companies funding their AI projects with debt.

To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief.

headline: What IREN (IREN)'s Landmark Microsoft AI Cloud Deal Means For Shareholders
summary: Microsoft recently announced a multi-year US$9.7 billion agreement with IREN Limited to access Nvidia GB300 GPUs through phased deployments at IREN's Texas data center campus, supported by a related US$5.8 billion procurement agreement for GPUs and equipment with Dell Technologies. This development highlights IREN's successful shift from cryptocurrency mining to AI cloud infrastructure, positioning the company as a significant partner for global technology leaders seeking advanced,...

headline: The Bull Case For Amazon.com (AMZN) Could Change Following Landmark $38 Billion Cloud Deal With OpenAI
summary: Amazon.com recently announced strong third-quarter 2025 results, highlighted by a surge in AWS revenue and the signing of a landmark multi-year, US$38 billion cloud services agreement with OpenAI to support advanced AI workloads. This collaboration marks OpenAI's first major cloud partnership outside of Microsoft, underscoring Amazon's strengthening position in artificial intelligence infrastructure and cloud computing. We'll explore how the new OpenAI partnership and AWS growth momentum...
